title: Reasons I may be temporarily, or permanently, quitting.
body:
I'm quitting league for now because I can't even level an account to 30 without being permed for no reason.
I've never seen a more horrible system then what league has, you get a chat restrict, a 14 day ban, then perm, or if you're lucky, if they feel like being slightly less insane, they give you a 2nd chat restrict beforehand.
You literally only have to be toxic a couple of games out of like 100s to get banned, it's the dumbest shit I've ever seen.
So if someone has a bad day and is slightly toxic like one game every 2 weeks, they get permed.
That's literally the dumbest shit I've ever seen.
You can literally get permed for barely being toxic to, it doesn't have to be like you told someone to off themself or rage the entire game, literally just say "You're a moron" one time, and you get punished.
I'm leaving until the league community stops acting like they're 5 years old and grows thicker skin, this community has become perpetually more oversensitive then fucking tumblr, and that's literally a feat that I thought could never be done.
I may play some games occasionally, but I'm not dedicating time to this game until someone fucking fixes this stupid shit.
Why the hell do you think that low level games are full of smurfs, and if you ask them half of the time it's because they were banned, it's because this retarded shit.
